name: What da..........
reviewBody: OK here it goes..... I've been using this great site for many years reviewing, searching, and occasionally reading reviews. Never have I left a comment on movies before, but after watching this movie it seems I had no choice. I got this movie as a gift, being I'm sort of a "movie buff" the person got it for me cause it was said to be one of the greatest movies ever. My first attempt, I fell asleep, perhaps due to a long and hectic day. My second attempt, I was in the mood for a great classic/drama and gave it another chance. Now I'm not going to go into all the fancy terms critics use to evaluate movies, or scripts, screens, acting....but this movie, is by far, the most boring movie I have ever seen in my life. Its just that simple. Boring. In 1941....perhaps a classic, but today....BORING.
